entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET X509Chain.Build() works on one Windows system but not another #78254
  • Cannot use generic attributes on a struct in Blazor WASM #78255
  • Error MSB3073: dotnet restore failing in CI on FreeBSD #78251
  • LibraryImport with custom StringMarshalling type causes the source generator to keep #78242
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: StringValues implicit conversion to string?[]? causes confusing error with Logging methods #78241
  • Cannot load project after update to 17.4 #78237
  • Potential deadlock in EventListener #78233
    8.0.0
  • New blazorwasm app unable to debug in browser (.net 7.0) - VSCode #78232
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2 `--pdb` does not work #78230
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility 6.0.1 cause CVE-2022-41064 issue #78227
  • ParamName of ArgumentNullException for new FileInfo is incorrect in .NET 7 #78224
    8.0.0
  • plugin - dll not in bin directory #78220
  • Huge Breaking Issue in Net7 with MemberInfo equality #78218
    8.0.0
  • Arithmetic overflow in code, generated by `GeneratedRegexAttribute` #78214
  • Incorrect order of arguments when calling the 'XmlConfigurationElementTextContent' constructor #78212
  • Perf_Timer.AsynchronousContention and Perf_Timer.SynchronousContention benchmark issue on Mono Interpreter #78209
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .Net 7 #78206
  • mono runtime using 3rd Party library internal invoke native code lead app crash #78205
  • Use new IndexOfAnyValues throughout dotnet/runtime #78204
    8.0.0
  • Use new IndexOfAnyValues in RegexCompiler and source generator #78203
    8.0.0
  • [Experiment] Modernization of Locks #78202
    8.0.0
  • JIT forgets about a hoisted vector load and emits unnecessary memory reads #78201
  • Generic custom attributes don't work #78200
    7.0.x

Closed

  • MapBackgroundJob for Minimal APIs #78137
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute for mark functions returning rent arrays from some pool #66667
    Future
  • Track CA1849 related diagnostics #57145
    8.0.0
  • TarFile fails to extract even when symbolic link references into the output directory #77303
  • Test failure System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout #77802
  • Recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #77971
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) #75322
    8.0.0
  • Is it possible to use a AOT dll with a WPF project? #78211
  • gdb fails to load debug symbols for NAOT-ed executable in release mode #78210
  • VectorSingle and VectorDoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest fails on Mono #74781
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent behavior in NET7 String.Equals #78169
    8.0.0
  • Cannot hit breakpoint when Blazor wasm project path contains special characters #76777
    7.0.x
  • XsltCompiler.Tests Failure #24718
    Future
  • .Net 6/Win11 HttpClient HandshakeFailure TLS issue #77393
  • System.Net.Security.Tests crashed on Alpine.arm32 and OSX.1200 #72227
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Performance regression in many places caused by #77562 #78163
  • Launch Without Debugging Doesn't Block BackgroundService and Whole App but Debug Does #77523
    8.0.0
  • code=killed, signal=ABRT #76987
  • "Namespace" is not a supported Runtime Directive #78185
  • CertificateRequest: when ECDSA named curve is unrecognized, confusing exception raised #72816
    Future
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute replaces verbatim string with regular string #78113
  • The "Collection was of a fixed size." exception when configuring options. #77725
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Fix mono dotnet creation #78257
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] React to CheckForOverflowUnderflow in regex source generator #78256
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Simplify `impAssignStruct[Ptr]` and `gtNewBlkOpNode` #78252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Forcing auto binding redirects on Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests to fix test issue. #78250
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix Equals in hot reload scenario #78249
    area-System.Reflection
  • add README files for Microsoft.Win32.* #78248
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Delete some `ADDR`-related code #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny in IndexOfHtmlAttributeEncodingChars #78240
    area-System.Net
  • Fix argument exception names in File/DirectoryInfo #78239
    area-System.IO
  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug in String.Equals unrolling for CJK single-char strings #78234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use `FIELD_ADDR` for all `ldflda`s #78226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Various support changes and cleanups for the jiterpreter PR #78225
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Arm64: Support additional condition checks in select nodes #78223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Don't need to escape special characters anymore #78217
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78216
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix a crash when emitting P_OBJC_GET_SELECTOR opcodes. #78215
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #78213
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix `--singlemethodname` #78207
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Removing obsolete references to 'emitMaxTmpSize' #78199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • React to CheckForOverflowUnderflow in regex source generator #78228
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Ensure ReadBufferState resets any BOM offsets every time the buffer is advanced. #78235
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix performance regression in STJ JsonNode instantiations #78147
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78018
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.1
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource readme small typo #78253
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource
  • System.Diagnostics.EventLog: Add README #78243
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Prefer concrete instances instead of gshared ones for met… #78182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #78035
    area-VM-coreclr
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter: Add README #78244
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource: Add README #78245
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Ensure ReadBufferState resets any BOM offsets every time the buffer is advanced. #78221
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C: SetMessageSendPendingException and SetMessageSendCallback #77956
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Fix bug in String.Equals unrolling for certain single-char strings #78190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Diagnosing failures #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix errors being logged multiple times #75947
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Delete `fgMorphBlockOperand` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fixing memory ordering issue in ConcurrentQueue #78178
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Backport pr75366 to 6.0 #77921
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization
